about.title: About
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. For acquisition inquiries, consignments, or general questions, send us a message and our team will get back to you.
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.placeholderMessage: Tell us about the artwork or project...
about.description: Benito Pepito is a vibrant multidisciplinary artist. Working across sculpture, painting, and home & garden creations, he explores materials and processes with freedom and curiosity. His work is defined by bold, often large-scale pieces where color, texture and experimentation take center stage.
about.visionText: At Benito Pepito, we believe that art should be accessible to everyone. Each artwork tells a unique story and brings a touch of elegance to your living space.
about.collectionsText: Sculpture, painting, and home & garden installations - discover our curated selection of exceptional works created with passion and craftsmanship.
about.visitText: Come discover our works in person at our exhibition space in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu.
footer.blurb: Marketplace for sculpture, painting, and home & garden installations.
